name: A Minute It Takes
description:
A Minute It Takes

Third installment in Uh Minute Series is a Fast paced, Time limited and a Horror Survival game.

Darius, an Archeologist finds a mystical Clock on StarSnake Island from UhMinute2 and gets teleported to Chaos Realm.

Help him escape the time loop by infusing him in Candle of Spirits

Theme of this game:

Time based and Escaping Fate.

Art Style for this game is inspired by:

Cyberpunk and Vaporwave Culture:

Music by:

Kwill Music & TimBeek

WARNING:

      game is in development,

      Please feel free to report bugs,

      there will be Updates and Bug Fixes. 

Controls:

A- Left , D- Right , Space for Double Jump and Jump.

Support Here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJWB5vOJ5lCCGqlek7la-SQ

more updates coming soon

All Creators of the assets i used in game are mentioned in Game Credits.

EVERY SECOND MATTERS!
